name: prometheus-site
description: Performance-forward monorepo for Qwik City web and Bun Elysia API services.

scripts.build: bun run --cwd apps/web build && bun run --cwd apps/api build
scripts.format: bun run --cwd apps/web format && bun run --cwd apps/api format
scripts.test: bun run --cwd apps/web test && bun run --cwd apps/api test
